clear_history_description: This will permanently delete all your sessions.
are_you_sure_description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete all your conversation history.
history_cleared_description: All your conversation data has been removed.
welcome_subtitle: Your personal AI-powered transcription and note-taking assistant.
welcome_instruction: Click "New Session" in the sidebar to start recording.
transcript_placeholder: Your live transcription will appear here...
error_browser_not_supported_description: Speech recognition is not supported in your browser.
error_microphone_access_denied_descripti: Please allow microphone access to use this feature.
error_generate_summary_failed_generic: Could not generate summary. Please try again.
